body: The budget here is **1 hour**, which is exactly how much time will be paid for when the task is completed

Sorry for delay with the feedback. These holidays make me crazy. Left a message via oDesk.
@olezhik this task is not yours any more, please stop working with it (or ignore it if you haven't started yet), Thanks!
@asinyagin the task is for you now, follow [these guidelines](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). Don't hesitate to ask any technical questions right here

@dmarkov I can't decide what data to use in the integration test. In a test for gist reading and writing first user's gist is used. But I can't use same approach, because users couldn't fork their own gists. In the test I could use some hardcoded gist's id or find a user with gists and fork his first gist. Which way should I choose?

@asinyagin Good question. I don't have an answer. Let's skip integration test implementation and mark it with `@todo` (see http://www.tpc2.com/dev/pdd). Sometime later we'll find out how to implement this test.
